items.description: A first-of-its-kind deal could finally unlock institutional money for carbon credits--and Microsoft's already in.

items.title: The Node: JPM’s BTC Lending Play
items.description: One of the trends that I’m keeping an eye on is the growing availability of bitcoin-backed loans. Let’s check in on the sector real quick.

items.title: JPMorgan Chase (JPM) Partners With Tech Mahindra To Enhance Global Payment Solutions
items.description: JPMorgan Chase (JPM) made headlines recently with Tech Mahindra joining its Payments System Integrator Program, aligning for enhanced global payment infrastructure. Concurrent initiatives like the launch of Solo 401(k), featuring flexibility for solo entrepreneurs, and improvements to the Self-Directed Investing Platform reflect JPM's focus on diversified service expansion. These developments, alongside broader market moves, might have contributed to the 21% price increase last quarter...
